page.title: 08 THE CHIEF PLEAS
page.content: Sark runs under the old feudal system (its own rules and laws);the justice of the laws are decided on Sark in the court. The court room is the islands Senior School, so if there is a court the children have a day off. Three times a year 'Chief Pleas' is held.These meetings are in are Spring,Michaelmas,and Christmas.Chief Pleas is a gathering of the Islands' Parliament and Deputies who are chosen by the people.Here any important decisions can be made and improvements discussed. All courts in Sark are agreed by the Baliff of Guernsey.
